text: Table Tennis at the 2015 Island Games was held at the Geoff Reed Table Tennis Centre, Jersey from 28 June to 3 July. == Medal Table == == Results == {| |- | Men’s singles | | | |- | Women’s singles | | | |- | Men’s doubles | Björn Axelsson Nisse Lundberg | Joshua Band Jordan Wykes | Jonas Berglund Johan Eriksson |- | Women's doubles | Alice Loveridge Dawn Morgan | Durita Fríðadóttir Jensen Henrietta Nielsen | Evelina Carlsson Elin Schwartz |- | Mixed doubles | Marina Donner Johan Pettersson | Garry Dodd Alice Loveridge | Jonas Berglund Lina Olofsson |- | Team | Joshua Butler Garry Dodd Samantha Kershaw Alice Loveridge Dawn Morgan Elizabeth Priest Alex Robinson Joshua Stacey | Björn Axelsson Jonas Berglund Evelina Carlsson Johan Eriksson Nisse Lundberg Alice Nilsson Lina Olofsson Elin Schwartz | Jim Bergbo Marina Donner Harry Lindqvist Johan Pettersson Lucas Stenius |- |} == References == Category:Table tennis at multi-sport events Category:2015 Island Games
title: Table tennis at the 2015 Island Games
